name: Seared Chicken With Avocado
recipeIngredient: 4 (4 oz) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle seasoning on both sides of chicken
Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over high heat. Add chicken, smooth side down, to pan; cook 1 minute or until seared.
Reduce hate to medium; cook 3 minutes on each side or until lightly browned.
Combine avocado, cilantro, pepper, lime juice and salt.
Squeeze one-quarter lime over each piece of chicken before serving. Serve with avocado mixture.
